name: FrameWork (WyldFire Games)
description:
FrameWork is a story driven puzzle game about the unbreakable bond between two brothers. You play as 14 year old boy Flint who, after losing his brother in a fatal accident, spirals into nothing.

But his big brother was working on something big. What could it be?

Meet the brothers: 

Flint:

Zayne:
